## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G09860](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G09860)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtHPR1, AtTHO1, HPR1, RAE3, THO1</u>
- **Gene Name:** REGULATION OF ATALMT1 EXPRESSION 3
- **Description:**   nuclear matrix protein-like protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2178183
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [hps8/hps8]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Enhanced phosphate starvation induced root APase activity.Reduced number of lateral roots when grown on phosphate medium.
